name: The Hot Chick
tagline: An attractive and popular teenager who is mean spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

name: Good Deeds
tagline: Businessman Wesley Deeds is jolted out of his scripted life when he meets Lindsey, a single mother who works on the cleaning crew in his office building.

name: Good Luck Chuck

production.name: Province of British Columbia Production Services Tax Credit

tagline: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

name: Ghoulies
tagline: A young man and his girlfriend move into an man's old mansion home, where he becomes possessed by a need to control ancient demons.

name: Midnight Express
tagline: The true story of Billy Hayes, an American college student who is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

name: Red Heat
tagline: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis, and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

name: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
tagline: Freddy Krueger returns once again to haunt both the dreams of his daughter and Springwood's last surviving teenager.

name: White Fang
tagline: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

name: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
Take the Lead
tagline: The real story of a dance teacher who believed in the talent of a group of problem kids.

name: Places in the Heart
tagline: In 1930's Southern US, a widow and her family try to run their cotton farm with the help of a disparate group of friends.

name: Dangerous Liaisons
tagline: Rich and bored aristocrats in Rococo France play high-stakes games of passion and betrayal.

name: Judge Dredd
tagline: In a dystopian future, Dredd, the most famous judge (a cop with instant field judiciary powers) is convicted for a crime he did not commit while his murderous counterpart escapes.

name: Richard Pryor Live on the Sunset Strip
Licence to Kill
tagline: A vengeful British spy goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a CIA agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

name: Addicted to Love
tagline: Maggie's and Sam's former partners are in love; she wants revenge and he wants his lost love back, so they work together to break up the happy couple.

name: Hostage
tagline: A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.

name: Cradle 2 the Grave
tagline: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

name: Mississippi Burning
tagline: Two FBI agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

name: The Killing Fields
tagline: A photographer is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody "Year Zero" cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million "undesirable" civilians.

name: Thirteen Days
tagline: A dramatization of President Kennedy's administration's struggle to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis in October of 1962.

name: Jack Frost
tagline: A father, who can't keep his promises, dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman, who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

name: The 6th Day
tagline: Futuristic action about a man who meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

name: Courageous
tagline: When a tragedy strikes close to home, four police officers struggle with their faith and their roles as husbands and fathers; together they make a decision that will change all of their lives.

name: Heat
tagline: Las Vegas is the backdrop for all the torrid action of heat, as Burt Reynolds plays the soft-hearted bodyguard who's out to protect his friends.

name: Monster
tagline: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

name: Like Father Like Son
tagline: A mysterious potion switches the personalities of a buttoned up doctor and his laid back son.

name: The Watch
tagline: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.

name: Texas Chainsaw 3D
tagline: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

name: Malibu's Most Wanted
tagline: A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.

name: Babel
tagline: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

name: Alexander
tagline: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

name: The Hunted
tagline: An FBI deep-woods tracker captures a trained assassin who has made a sport of hunting humans.

name: The Reader
tagline: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
tagline: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

name: Cinderella
tagline: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

name: My Dog Skip
tagline: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

name: Instinct
tagline: When a noted anthropologist who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist to get through to him.

name: The Truth About Cats & Dogs
tagline: A successful veternarian & radio show host with low self-esteem asks her model friend to impersonate her when a handsome man wants to see her.

name: Snakes on a Plane
tagline: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and poisonous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

name: King Ralph
tagline: As the only relative to take over the Royal throne, a down on his luck American slob must learn the ways of the English.

name: Closer
tagline: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

name: The Relic
tagline: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

name: Darkman
tagline: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

name: Mickey Blue Eyes
tagline: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

name: All About Steve
tagline: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.

name: Stuck on You
tagline: Conjoined twins from Martha's Vineyard move to Los Angeles so that one of them can pursue an acting career.

name: Where the Heart Is
tagline: A pregnant 17-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Wal-Mart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

name: Curly Sue
tagline: A homeless man and his young companion who survive by conning people meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

name: She's the Man
tagline: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks in London, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguises herself as him, and proceeds to fall for one of her soccer teammates. Little does she realize she's not the only one with romantic troubles, as she, as he, gets in the middle of a series of intermingled love affairs.

name: Dreamcatcher
tagline: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

name: The Punisher
tagline: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash vengeance upon the corrupt businessman who slew his family.

name: Marmaduke
tagline: A suburban family moves to a new neighborhood with their large yet lovable Great Dane, who has a tendency to wreak havoc in his own oblivious way.

name: Muppet Treasure Island
tagline: The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

name: Nell
tagline: In a remote woodland cabin, a small town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit woman with many secrets.

name: R.I.P.D.
tagline: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

name: Devil
tagline: A group of people are trapped in an elevator and the Devil is mysteriously amongst them.

name: Flags of Our Fathers
tagline: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

name: The Constant Gardener
tagline: A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.

name: Magnificent Desolation: Walking on the Moon 3D
Pay It Forward
tagline: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.

name: Semi-Pro
tagline: Jackie Moon, the owner-coach-player of the American Basketball Association's Flint Michigan Tropics, rallies his teammates to make their NBA dreams come true

name: Fireproof
tagline: In an attempt to save his marriage, A firefighter uses a 40-day experiment known as "The Love Dare".

name: Street Fighter
tagline: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

name: Black Knight
tagline: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

name: Doubt
tagline: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

name: Blue Jasmine
tagline: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...

name: Halloween II
tagline: Laurie Strode struggles to come to terms with her brother Michael's deadly return to Haddonfield, Illinois; meanwhile, Michael prepares for another reunion with his sister.

name: See Spot Run
tagline: A mailman takes care of a dog that, unbeknownst to him, is an FBI drug-sniffing superdog that has escaped from the witness protection program after becoming the target of an assassination.

name: 2016: Obama's America
tagline: A documentary that examines the question, "If Barack Obama wins a second term, where will we be in 2016?"

name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
tagline: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

name: The Informant!
tagline: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.

name: Child's Play
tagline: A single mother gives her son a beloved doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed with the soul of a serial killer.

name: Amélie
tagline: Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.

name: Silverado
tagline: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

name: I Spy
tagline: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

name: Teen Wolf
tagline: A struggling high school student with problems discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

name: Matilda
tagline: Story of a wonderful little girl, who happens to be a genius, and her wonderful teacher vs. the worst parents ever and the worst school principal imaginable.

name: Zodiac
tagline: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.

name: The Rite
tagline: An American seminary student travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

name: Arthur

production.name: Morra, Brezner, Steinberg and Tenenbaum Entertainment (MBST)

tagline: A drunken playboy stands to lose a wealthy inheritance when he falls for a woman his family doesn't like.

name: Dracula 2000
tagline: A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

name: TRON
tagline: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

name: Breach
tagline: Based on the true story, FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

name: *batteries not included
tagline: Apartment block tenants seek the aid of alien mechanical life-forms to save their building from demolition.

name: Mercury Rising
tagline: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

name: Daylight
tagline: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

name: In Her Shoes
tagline: Straight-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

name: Balls of Fury
tagline: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

name: Bad News Bears
tagline: A grizzled little league coach tries to turn his team of misfits into champs.
